user.title: Set up GitOps Integration
user.description: Configure GitOps deployment webhook and Infisical secrets management. The webhook secret will be automatically fetched from Infisical or generated if not found.

git_lock_detected.title: Git Lock File Detected
git_lock_detected.description:
A git lock file was detected at `.git/index.lock`. This usually indicates a previous git operation was interrupted (e.g., by a crash). To resolve, you can remove the lock file manually via SSH or the File Editor addon:

```bash
rm /config/.git/index.lock
```

After removing the lock file, retry the deployment.

restart_required.title: Home Assistant Restart Required

infisical_connection_failed.title: Infisical Connection Failed
infisical_connection_failed.description:
Failed to connect to Infisical server: {error}

Secrets synchronization is disabled until the connection is restored. Check your Infisical configuration and network connectivity.

infisical_sync_failed.title: Infisical Secret Sync Failed
infisical_sync_failed.description:
Failed to synchronize secrets from Infisical: {error}

This may cause issues with configurations that depend on secrets. The integration will retry automatically.

git_connection_failed.title: Git Repository Connection Failed
git_connection_failed.description:
Failed to initialize git repository: {error}

Deployments are disabled until the git repository is accessible.

deployment_interrupted.title: Previous Deployment Interrupted
deployment_interrupted.description:
A deployment that started at {timestamp} (commit: {commit}) did not complete, likely due to a Home Assistant crash or restart.

Please check the system logs and current configuration state. You may need to manually verify the deployment or trigger a new one.

integration_needs_reload.title: GitOps Integration Updated
integration_needs_reload.description:
The GitOps integration was updated from commit {old_version} to {new_version}.

To apply the changes, please reload the integration:
1. Go to Settings → Devices & Services
2. Find GitOps integration
3. Click the three dots menu → Reload

Alternatively, restart Home Assistant to fully reload the integration.
